name: fiery-wrath
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.
